summary: A happily-married woman wishes she had met her second husband earlier, so that she could avoid many mistakes of the past. When suddenly moved back in time to 1980s she realizes she has one goal: find her future love.
cast: Ilona Ostrowska|Maciej Marczewski|Robert Wieckiewicz|Danuta Szaflarska|Maja Ostaszewska|Sylwia Dziorek|Katarzyna Kwiatkowska|Michal Zielinski|Magdalena Walig√≥rska|Weronika Ksiazkiewicz|Malgorzata Buczkowska|Andrzej Mlynarczyk|Tomasz Schimscheiner|Agnieszka Mandat|Grzegorz Lukawski|Jacek Borcuch|Mieczyslaw Grabka|Jan Monczka|Zdzislaw Rychter|Przemyslaw Bluszcz|Agnieszka Wosinska|Artur Janusiak|Agnieszka Sienkiewicz|Krzysztof Kiersznowski|Krystyna Rutkowska-Ulewicz|Zofia Plewinska|Dorota Kolak|Aleksander Trabczynski|Krzysztof Czeczot|Paulina Holtz|Jolanta Juszkiewicz-Lenartowicz|Maciej Mikolajczyk
title: Ile wazy kon trojanski?
